definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: Harder's superiors grabbed their radios, desperately calling for air power.
sentences.chinese: 哈爾德的上司捉起無線電報話機，拼命呼喚空中支援。

sentences.english: Then he used his walkie-talkie to radio headquarters for reinforcements.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他又用無線電報話機向總部請求支援。
